main: ^Scientifically proven, laughter releases endorphins and reduces stress, as highlighted by the Journal of Happiness Studies. (Press 'Space' to choose)
answer: ^Laughter is often referred to as "the best medicine".
^That's because it has been scientifically proven to release endorphins, the body's natural feel-good chemicals.
^Additionally, laughter can reduce stress and contribute to an overall sense of well-being.
^The idea that laughter has positive effects on health is supported by various studies
^including research highlighted in the Journal of Happiness Studies.
